item.title: Ground Proximity Warning System (GPWS) – Advisory Callouts (Mode 6)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

numlitem.para: (PM) Pilot monitoring performs standard callouts listed in AOM (i.e., Approaching Minimums, Minimums 500', 100', 50', 30', Bank Angle 35°, 40°, 45° as appropriate).

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "GPWS ADVISORY CALLOUTS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
